modName: Aera lv1 Nord - off to Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
If you think you\'re ready to go when you download this save, YOU ARE VERY WRONG!

Longer readme is included with the save file and you absolutely must read it if you want to get this right.

Used mods are original work of their respective authors, this isn\'t a pack, you will have to download every mod from corresponding page. (readme covers all)

CBBE by Caliente
High quality eyes by Xenius
Skimpy Nightingale Armor by Killer Keo
Nightingale Prime Textures by Zerofrost (no longer available on the Nexus)
Face & Hair by FrankSunday (no longer available on the Nexus, it\'s hosted elsewhere, readme will tell you where)

HUGE THANKS TO ALL AUTHORS WHO MADE MODS USED IN THIS GAME SAVE. I DID NOTHING, JUST SOME SIMPLE COMBINING, NO CHANGES TO THE INDIVIDUAL MODS WHATSOEVER.

So grab it while you can and remember: DON\'T LIKE IT? DON\'T DOWNLOAD IT! MKAY?
author: cj
